content:
Please post specific ideas at https://connect.mozilla.org/t5/ideas/idb-p/ideas/label-name/thunderbird - just one issue per idea please.

You can also vote on many other ideas.
creator: wsmwk

content: More details are needed. At what point does it stop responding?
creator: siffemoz

content: - click the 'new message' button - if menu bar is not visible, press alt key - now, press view>toolbars and tick composition toolbar
creator: davidsk
